Package com.islandpower.configurator.service.project

Class ProjectSolarPanelService

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.service.project.ProjectSolarPanelService
@Service public class ProjectSolarPanelService extends Object
Service for managing solar panels in a project configuration. Provides methods for selecting suitable solar panels, calculating configuration details, and storing results.

    • getSuitableSolarPanels

      public List<SolarPanel> getSuitableSolarPanels(String projectId)
      Fetches suitable solar panels for a project based on system voltage.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      List of suitable solar panels

    • calculateSolarPanelConfiguration

      public ProjectSolarPanel calculateSolarPanelConfiguration(String projectId, String solarPanelId, double panelOversizeCoefficient, double batteryEfficiency, double cableEfficiency, List<Integer> selectedMonths, String installationType, double manufacturerTolerance, double agingLoss, double dirtLoss)
      Calculates the solar panel configuration for the project and saves it to the database.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      solarPanelId - The ID of the selected solar panel
      panelOversizeCoefficient - The coefficient for panel oversizing
      batteryEfficiency - The efficiency of the battery
      cableEfficiency - The efficiency of the cables
      selectedMonths - The list of selected months for energy calculations
      installationType - The type of installation (e.g., roof, ground)
      manufacturerTolerance - The tolerance factor for the solar panel manufacturer
      agingLoss - The loss factor due to aging of the panel
      dirtLoss - The loss factor due to dirt accumulation on the panels
      Returns:
      ProjectSolarPanel The calculated solar panel configuration

    • getProjectSolarPanel

      public ProjectSolarPanel getProjectSolarPanel(String projectId)
      Fetches the solar panel configuration for the specified project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      The ProjectSolarPanel configuration for the project
